alert.note: Alert for Eastern Monmouth; Ocean; Western Monmouth (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 10:25PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Ocean and eastern Monmouth Counties through 1100 PM EDT... At 1025 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Adelphia, or 13 miles west of Asbury Park, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Asbury Park, Middletown, Howell, Marlboro, Tinton Falls, Holmdel, Red Bank, Farmingdale, East Freehold, Jacksons Mills, West Freehold, Adelphia, Vista Center, Collingwood Park, Lincroft, Freewood Acres, Yorketown, Morganville, Eatontown and Freehold. This includes the following highways... Interstate 195 in New Jersey between mile markers 22 and 34. Garden State Parkway between mile markers 98 and 114. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
